transcription.diarization_description: Enable diarization and select the number of speakers
transcription.normalization_description: Enable normalization and replace text numbers by numbers
transcription.player_error: An error has occured while initializing player.

transcription_help.audio_player_shortcut_content: You can control the audio player by using standard player buttons and/or the following shortcuts:
transcription_help.audio_player_shortcut_list2: "CTRL + "Right arrow" ( + ) : Move forward 60 seconds
transcription_help.audio_player_shortcut_list3: "ALT" + "Right arrow" ( + ) : Move forward 10 seconds
transcription_help.audio_player_shortcut_list4: "SHIFT" + "Right arrow" ( + ) : Move forward 3 seconds
transcription_help.audio_player_shortcut_list5: "CTRL + "Left arrow" ( + ) : Move backward 60 seconds
transcription_help.audio_player_shortcut_list6: "ALT" + "Left arrow" ( + ) : Move backward 10 seconds
transcription_help.audio_player_shortcut_list7: "SHIFT" + "Left arrow" ( + ) : Move backward 3 seconds
transcription_help.edit_speaker_content: To change the speaker for a given turn, click on the speaker name. This will open a drop-down menu with the following options:
transcription_help.edit_speaker_content_list: To change the name for the current turn only, click directly on the desired name or click on "Add a speaker" to add a new speaker. | To change the name for the current turn only, click directly on the desired name.
transcription_help.edit_transcript_content: To edit the transcript, simply click on the word to place your cursor and start typing. | The audio player will automatically jump to the part of the audio in which that word was uttered.
transcription_help.filter_speaker_content: You can filter the transcription by speaker by selecting a speaker name from the drop-down "Filter" menu just above the transcript. When a speaker is selected, the transcript editor will only show turns from that speaker and the audio player will only play audio associated with those turns.
transcription_help.merge_turn_content: Click on the "merge" button () to merge two turns.
transcription_help.split_turn_content: To split an existing turn into two separate turns, place your cursor where you would like to create the new turn and press "Enter" (). Note that the new turn will still be attributed to the original speaker.
